languages.text: {n}Сестра Арджента встречает вас легчайшим полупоклоном.{/n} "Лорд-капитан. Я рада, что вы пришли. И хочу принести извинения за прежнюю... холодность. После нашей первой встречи я опасалась, что вы окажетесь еще одним гнилым ростком семейного древа фон Валанциус, как... как предатель Кунрад. Но теперь я вижу перед собой достойного лидера и слугу {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Я рада быть вам соратницей".

traits.locale_text: {n}Сестра Арджента встречает вас легчайшим полупоклоном.{/n} "Лорд-капитан. Я рада, что вы пришли. И хочу принести извинения за прежнюю... холодность. После нашей первой встречи я опасалась, что вы окажетесь еще одним гнилым ростком семейного древа фон Валанциус, как... как предатель Кунрад. Но теперь я вижу перед собой достойного лидера и слугу Империума. Я рада быть вам соратницей".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sister Argenta greets you with the slightest half-bow.{/n} "Lord Captain. Your presence is welcome. And I wish to apologise for my prior... coldness. After our first meeting I was concerned that you would turn out to be another faithless offshoot of the von Valancius dynasty, like... like the traitor Kunrad. But now I see before me a worthy leader and servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I am glad to accompany you in your endeavours."

После нашей первой встречи я опасалась, что вы окажетесь еще одним гнилым ростком семейного древа фон Валанциус, как... как предатель Кунрад. Но теперь я вижу перед собой достойного лидера и слугу {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Я рада быть вам соратницей".

traits.locale_text: {n}Sister Argenta greets you with the slightest half-bow.{/n} "Lord Captain. I'm glad you came. And I wish to apologize for my prior... coldness. After our first meeting I was worried that you would turn out to be another rotten offshoot of the von Valancius family tree, like... like the traitor Kunrad. But now I see before me a worthy leader and servant of the Imperium. I'm glad to be your comrade."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔微微欠身，向你致意。{/n}“欢迎你的到来，舰长大人。我想为我之前的……冷漠致歉。我们第一次见面后，我一直担心你会成为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝另一位背信弃义的子嗣，就像……就像昆拉德那个叛徒一样，但现在，我看到了一位值得尊敬的领袖，{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}忠诚的仆人。我很高兴能在你的旅程中伴你前行。”
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta greets you with the slightest half-bow.{/n} "Lord Captain. Your presence is welcome. And I wish to apologise for my prior... coldness. After our first meeting I was concerned that you would turn out to be another faithless offshoot of the von Valancius dynasty, like... like the traitor Kunrad. But now I see before me a worthy leader and servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I am glad to accompany you in your endeavours."

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta greets you with the slightest half-bow.{/n} "Lord Captain. Your presence is welcome. And I wish to apologise for my prior... coldness. After our first meeting I was concerned that you would turn out to be another faithless offshoot of the von Valancius dynasty, like... like the traitor Kunrad. But now I see before me a worthy leader and servant of the Imperium. I am glad to accompany you in your endeavours."

languages.text: {n}La hermana Argenta te recibe con una media reverencia sutil.{/n} «Lord Capitán. Me alegro de verle. Quería disculparme por mi anterior... frialdad. Tras nuestro primer encuentro, me preocupaba la posibilidad de que fuera otro retoño traicionero de la dinastía von Valancius, como... como esa víbora, Kunrad. Pero ahora veo que tengo ante mí a un{mf||a} líder dign{mf|o|a} y a un{mf||a} sirviente fiel del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Me alegro de poder acompañarle en sus empresas».
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta greets you with the slightest half-bow.{/n} "Lord Captain. Your presence is welcome. And I wish to apologise for my prior... coldness. After our first meeting I was concerned that you would turn out to be another faithless offshoot of the von Valancius dynasty, like... like the traitor Kunrad. But now I see before me a worthy leader and servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I am glad to accompany you in your endeavours."

traits.locale_text: {n}La hermana Argenta te recibe con una media reverencia sutil.{/n} «Lord Capitán. Me alegro de verle. Quería disculparme por mi anterior... frialdad. Tras nuestro primer encuentro, me preocupaba la posibilidad de que fuera otro retoño traicionero de la dinastía von Valancius, como... como esa víbora, Kunrad. Pero ahora veo que tengo ante mí a un{mf||a} líder dign{mf|o|a} y a un{mf||a} sirviente fiel del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Me alegro de poder acompañarle en sus empresas».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}シスター・アルジェンタは軽く礼をして挨拶する。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン。ようこそ。そして、以前の非礼をお詫びしたい。初めて会った後、私は、あなたが裏切り者のクンラッドのように、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の忠実でない分派の一人になるのではないかと心配していたのだ。しかし今、私の目の前にいるのは立派な指導者であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}に仕える者だ。私は、あなたの努力に同行できることをうれしく思う」
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta greets you with the slightest half-bow.{/n} "Lord Captain. Your presence is welcome. And I wish to apologise for my prior... coldness. After our first meeting I was concerned that you would turn out to be another faithless offshoot of the von Valancius dynasty, like... like the traitor Kunrad. But now I see before me a worthy leader and servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I am glad to accompany you in your endeavours."

traits.locale_text: {n}シスター・アルジェンタは軽く礼をして挨拶する。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン。ようこそ。そして、以前の非礼をお詫びしたい。初めて会った後、私は、あなたが裏切り者のクンラッドのように、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の忠実でない分派の一人になるのではないかと心配していたのだ。しかし今、私の目の前にいるのは立派な指導者であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}に仕える者だ。私は、あなたの努力に同行できることをうれしく思う」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Schwester Argenta begrüßt dich mit einer angedeuteten Verbeugung.{/n} "Lord Captain. Eure Anwesenheit ist willkommen. Und ich möchte mich für meine vorherige ... Kälte entschuldigen. Nach unserer ersten Begegnung war ich besorgt, dass Ihr Euch als weiterer ungläubiger Sprössling der Dynastie von Valancius entpuppt, wie ... wie der Verräter Kunrad. Doch nun sehe ich vor mir {mf|einen würdigen Anführer und Diener|eine würdige Anführerin und Dienerin} des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}. Ich bin froh, Euch auf Euren Reisen begleiten zu dürfen."
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta greets you with the slightest half-bow.{/n} "Lord Captain. Your presence is welcome. And I wish to apologise for my prior... coldness. After our first meeting I was concerned that you would turn out to be another faithless offshoot of the von Valancius dynasty, like... like the traitor Kunrad. But now I see before me a worthy leader and servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I am glad to accompany you in your endeavours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Schwester Argenta begrüßt dich mit einer angedeuteten Verbeugung.{/n} "Lord Captain. Eure Anwesenheit ist willkommen. Und ich möchte mich für meine vorherige ... Kälte entschuldigen. Nach unserer ersten Begegnung war ich besorgt, dass Ihr Euch als weiterer ungläubiger Sprössling der Dynastie von Valancius entpuppt, wie ... wie der Verräter Kunrad. Doch nun sehe ich vor mir {mf|einen würdigen Anführer und Diener|eine würdige Anführerin und Dienerin} des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}. Ich bin froh, Euch auf Euren Reisen begleiten zu dürfen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sœur Argenta vous salue avec une très légère révérence.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. Votre présence m'honore. Et j'aimerais vous présenter mes excuses pour la... froideur dont j'ai fait preuve jusqu'ici. Après notre première rencontre, j'ai eu peur que vous ne deveniez un autre rejeton infidèle de la dynastie von Valancius, comme... comme ce traître de Kunrad. Mais je vois maintenant devant moi {mf|un digne dirigeant et serviteur|une digne dirigeante et servante} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Je suis fière de vous accompagner dans vos aventures. »
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta greets you with the slightest half-bow.{/n} "Lord Captain. Your presence is welcome. And I wish to apologise for my prior... coldness. After our first meeting I was concerned that you would turn out to be another faithless offshoot of the von Valancius dynasty, like... like the traitor Kunrad. But now I see before me a worthy leader and servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I am glad to accompany you in your endeavours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sœur Argenta vous salue avec une très légère révérence.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. Votre présence m'honore. Et j'aimerais vous présenter mes excuses pour la... froideur dont j'ai fait preuve jusqu'ici. Après notre première rencontre, j'ai eu peur que vous ne deveniez un autre rejeton infidèle de la dynastie von Valancius, comme... comme ce traître de Kunrad. Mais je vois maintenant devant moi {mf|un digne dirigeant et serviteur|une digne dirigeante et servante} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Je suis fière de vous accompagner dans vos aventures. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Rahibe Argenta seni yarım yamalak bir reveransla karşılıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan. İyi ki geldin. Daha evvelki... Soğuk davranışlarımdan ötürü özür dilerim. İlk görüşmemizden sonra o... O hain Kunrad gibi von Valancius hanedanlığının imansız bir mensubu çıkacağını sanmıştım. Şimdiyse karşımda gerçek bir lider ve {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} hizmetkârı duruyor. Gayretlerine eşlik etmek benim için onurdur."
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta greets you with the slightest half-bow.{/n} "Lord Captain. Your presence is welcome. And I wish to apologise for my prior... coldness. After our first meeting I was concerned that you would turn out to be another faithless offshoot of the von Valancius dynasty, like... like the traitor Kunrad. But now I see before me a worthy leader and servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I am glad to accompany you in your endeavours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Rahibe Argenta ,seni yarım yamalak bir reveransla karşılıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan. İyi ki geldin. Daha evvel gösterdiğim... soğuk davranışlarımdan ötürü özür dilerim. İlk görüşmemizden sonra o... o hain Kunrad gibi von Valancius hanedanlığının imansız bir üyesi çıkacağını sanmıştım. Ama şimdi karşımda gerçek bir lider ve {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un hizmetkârı duruyor. Gayretlerine eşlik etmek benim için onurdur."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
